name: Motor cortex recordings during motor learning (Lever press task)
citation: Chae, Soyoung (2024) Motor cortex recordings during motor learning (Lever press task) (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/001247/draft
description:
These are three separate datasets in the published papers

M1 L2/3 dataset: Peters, A. J., Chen, S. X., & Komiyama, T. (2014). Emergence of reproducible spatiotemporal activity during motor learning. Nature, 510(7504), 263-267.

M1 L5 dataset: Peters, A. J., Lee, J., Hedrick, N. G., O'Neil, K., & Komiyama, T. (2017). Reorganization of corticospinal output during motor learning. Nature neuroscience, 20(8), 1133-1141.

M2 L2/3 & L5 dataset: Makino, H., Ren, C., Liu, H., Kim, A. N., Kondapaneni, N., Liu, X., ... & Komiyama, T. (2017). Transformation of cortex-wide emergent properties during motor learning. Neuron, 94(4), 880-890.
